8. Beeken, N. S., **J. D. Selwyn**, and J. D. Hogan. (2021). Determining the life history strategy of the cryptobenthic reef gobies Coryphopterus hyalinus and C. personatus. [Marine Ecology Progress Series 659:161–173.](documents/Beeken et al_2021.pdf)
